name: Liberty Mutual Group
membership: National Insurance Trade Associations (UNESPA, APS, Insurance Ireland, Lloyd's Market Association, Chartered Insurance Institute, etc...)
goal: Liberty Mutual Insurance helps people preserve and protect what they earn, build, own and cherish. Keeping this promise means we are there when our customers need us most. Throughout our operations around the world, we are committed to providing insurance products and services to meet the needs of individuals, families and businesses; offering a diverse and dynamic work environment for our employees; and supporting our communities.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Insurance Files (IDD, Recovery and Resolution, Solvency II, ComFrame, EU-US Covered Agreement, etc...)
Taxation (CCTB/CCCTB, County by County Reporting)
GDPR
Brexit Negotiations
US-EU Trade
Collective Redress
